title: Strengthening Hospitality Practical Skills: 4C/ID Model-Based Media Literacy Competency Enhancement

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Customer service competency enhancement program for service/customer-facing role practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can critically analyze diverse media content according to scientific methodologies.
Learners can distinguish fake news from credible information sources with over 80% accuracy.
Learners can systematically interpret complex media phenomena using the 'supportive information' component of the 4C/ID model.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
